SEARCH
Package game.levels

Class LevelData

java.lang.Object
game.levels.LevelData
public class LevelData extends Object
This class Handles the saving, storing, deleting and loading of level data.

  • Field Details

    • PATH_1

      public static final String PATH_1
      The default path to save level data. This is used for the default save file.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • PATH_2

      public static final String PATH_2
      The path to save level data to. This is used for the backup save file.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelData

      public LevelData(Environments environment)
      Constructor for LevelData. Used to load level data from the default path.
      Parameters:
      environment - The environment to load the level data for.

    • LevelData

      public LevelData(Environments environment, String path)
      Constructor for LevelData. Used to load level data from a given file path.
      Parameters:
      environment - The environment to load the level data for.
      path - The path to load the level data from.

  • Method Details

    • isLocked

      public boolean isLocked(int level)
      Checks if the level is locked.
      Parameters:
      level - The level to check.
      Returns:
      true if the level is locked, false otherwise.

    • unlockLevel

      protected void unlockLevel(int levelNumber)
      Unlocks the next level. This will unlock the next level in the current environment. If the next level is the last level, it will unlock the first level of the next environment. Saves the game after unlocking the level.

    • getLevelData

      protected HashMap<Integer,Boolean> getLevelData()

    • getHighestUnlocked

      public int getHighestUnlocked()
      Gets the highest unlocked level.
      Returns:
      The highest unlocked level.

    • resetLevelData

      public static void resetLevelData()
      Resets all level data to default values. This stores the previous data in save2 and resets the data in save1. Save2 will be overridden the next time resetLevelData is called.

    • saveLevelDataWithPath

      public static void saveLevelDataWithPath(String path)
      Saves the level data to the specified path.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to save the level data to.

    • saveLevelData

      public static void saveLevelData()
      Saves the level data to the default path.
